original_text: And this is the reason why Joshua circumcised them: all the males of the people who came out of Egypt, all the men of war, had died in the wilderness on the way after they had come out of Egypt.
korean_text: 여호수아가 할례를 시행한 까닭은 이것이니 애굽에서 나온 모든 백성 중 남자 곧 모든 군사는 애굽에서 나온 후 광야 길에서 죽었는데

sentences.original_text: And this is the reason why Joshua circumcised them:
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여호수아가 그들에게 할례를 행한 이유는 이것입니다:

sentences.original_text: all the males of the people who came out of Egypt,
had died in the wilderness on the way
after they had come out of Egypt.
